placeholder.description: The placeholder date, which is used to determine what month to display when no date is selected. This updates as the user navigates the calendar, and can be used to programatically control the calendar's view.
placeholder.description_zh: 占位符日期，用于确定未选择日期时要显示的月份。这会在用户浏览日历时更新，并可用于以编程方式控制日历的视图。

pagedNavigation.description: Whether or not to use paged navigation for the calendar. Paged navigation causes the previous and next buttons to navigate by the number of months displayed at once, rather than by one month.
pagedNavigation.description_zh: 是否对日历使用分页导航。分页导航使上一个和下一个按钮按一次显示的月数导航，而不是按一个月导航。

preventDeselect.description: Whether or not to prevent the user from deselecting a date without selecting another date first.
preventDeselect.description_zh: 是否阻止用户在不先选择其他日期的情况下取消选择日期。

weekStartsOn.description: The day of the week to start the calendar on. 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.
weekStartsOn.description_zh: 开始日历的星期几。0 是星期日，1 是星期一，依此类推。

weekdayFormat.description: The format to use for the weekday strings provided via the weekdays slot prop.
weekdayFormat.description_zh: 用于通过工作日插槽 prop 提供的工作日字符串的格式。

calendarLabel.description: The accessible label for the calendar.

fixedWeeks.description: Whether or not to always display 6 weeks in the calendar.
fixedWeeks.description_zh: 是否始终在日历中显示 6 周。

isDateDisabled.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is disabled.
isDateDisabled.description_zh: 一个函数，用于返回是否禁用日期。

isDateUnavailable.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is unavailable.
isDateUnavailable.description_zh: 一个函数，用于返回日期是否不可用。

maxValue.description: The maximum date that can be selected.

minValue.description: The minimum date that can be selected.

locale.description: The locale to use for formatting dates.
locale.description_zh: 用于设置日期格式的区域设置。

multiple.description: Whether or not multiple dates can be selected.
multiple.description_zh: 是否可以选择多个日期。

numberOfMonths.description: The number of months to display at once.

disabled.description: Whether or not the accordion is disabled.

readonly.description: Whether or not the calendar is readonly.

hourCycle.description: The hour cycle to use for formatting times. Defaults to the locale preference
hourCycle.description_zh: 用于格式化时间的小时周期。默认为区域设置首选项

granularity.description: The granularity to use for formatting the field. Defaults to 'day' if a CalendarDate is provided, otherwise defaults to 'minute'. The field will render segments for each part of the date up to and including the specified granularity.
granularity.description_zh: 用于设置字段格式的粒度。如果提供了 CalendarDate，则默认为“day”，否则默认为“minute”。该字段将呈现日期的每个部分的段，直到并包括指定的粒度。

hideTimeZone.description: Whether or not to hide the time zone segment of the field.
hideTimeZone.description_zh: 是否隐藏字段的时区段。

validationId.description: The id of your validation message element, if any, which will be applied to the aria-describedby attribute of the appropriate elements when a validation error occurs.
validationId.description_zh: 验证消息元素的 ID（如果有），当发生验证错误时，该元素将应用于相应元素的 aria-describedby 属性。

descriptionId.description: The id of your description element, if any, which will be applied to the aria-describedby attribute of the appropriate elements.
descriptionId.description_zh: description 元素的 id（如果有），该 id 将应用于相应元素的 aria-describedby 属性。

disableFocusTrap.description: Whether or not to disable the focus trap that is applied to the popover when it's open.
disableFocusTrap.description_zh: 是否禁用在弹出窗口打开时应用于弹出窗口的焦点陷阱。

preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body while the popover is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: 是否阻止在弹出窗口打开时滚动正文。

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether or not to close the popover when clicking outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: 在弹出窗口外部单击时是否关闭弹出窗口。

closeOnEscape.description: Whether or not to close the popover when pressing the escape key.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 按下 Esc 键时是否关闭弹出窗口。

open.description: The open state of the link popover component.
open.description_zh: 链接弹出框组件的打开状态。

openFocus.description: Override the focus when the popover is opened.
openFocus.description_zh: 打开弹出框时覆盖焦点。

closeFocus.description: Override the focus when the popover is closed.
closeFocus.description_zh: 关闭弹出框时覆盖焦点。

portal.description: Where to render the popover when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: 弹出窗口打开时渲染弹出窗口的位置。默认为正文。可以通过传递 null 来禁用

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: A function that is called when the selected date changes.
events.description_zh: A function that is called when the selected date changes.

events.name: onPlaceholderChange
events.description: A function that is called when the placeholder date changes.
events.description_zh: A function that is called when the placeholder date changes.

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: A callback that fires when the open state changes.
events.description_zh: A callback that fires when the open state changes.

events.name: onOutsideClick
events.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

slots.name: months
slots.description: The current months to display in the calendar. Used to render the calendar.
slots.description_zh: 要在日历中显示的当前月份。用于呈现日历。

slots.name: weekdays
slots.description: The days of the week to display in the calendar, typically used within the table header.
slots.description_zh: 要在日历中显示的星期几，通常在表标题中使用。

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则要应用于元素的构建器属性和操作。
